name: Teleportation Exhaustion
text: Give to the Eden Fesi player. You cannot flip any Manifold supports to their TRAVELED side. Alter-Ego Action: Spend 3 resources of any type → remove Teleportation Exhaustion from the game.
flavor: "...We just some laws. Cosmic ones." - Wiz-Kid

name: Conquest at Any Cost
text: Forced Response: After a player changes their form, they must discard 1 card at random from their hand. [acceleration]
flavor: Emperor N'Jadaka has made a deal with a Klyntar symbiote. Now they are one and the same. They aim to remake the intergalactic Empire of Wakanda in their vision.

name: Emperor N'Jadaka
text: Retaliate 1. Forced Interrupt: When the round ends, heal 1 damage from Emperor N'Jadaka. (Manifold's nemesis minion.)
flavor: "This is my word. This my redemption."

name: Symbiotic Fury
text: Attach to Emperor N'Jadaka. If you cannot, attach to the villain. Attached enemy gains retaliate 1. * Forced Response: After attached enemy attacks you, heal 1 damage from them. Hero Action: Spend m p resources → discard this card.

name: Soulbond Symbiote
text: When Revealed: If Emperor N'Jadaka is not in play, summon him and reveal him. Otherwise, Emperor N'Jadaka activates against you.
flavor: "When I pledged myself to the Klyntar, I pledged to something that needed me... somthing that was me, and thus could never betray me." - Emperor N'Jadaka
